AiModelLanguage.name: AiModelLanguage
AiModelLanguage.description: An object that stores language related information that is generated for each AI model.

ApplicationType.description: Type of application using the AI model.

ExternalAiModelId.description: ID of the AI model used to generate predictions.

Language.description: Languages supported by this AI model.

ServingStatus.description: Determines if the language is enabled or disabled for this AI model.

TranscriptCount.description: Transcript count detected for each language.
